name: Chupa Chups Lollipops
description: Traditional lollipop range in a great variety of flavours. Creamy flavours may include Strawberries & Cream, Peach Yogurt, Choco-Vanilla, and Strawberry Yogurt. Fruit flavours may include Strawberry, Orange, Watermelon, and Cherry. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
